nodes.text: The Wheel Races was an event on the planet Jakku that took place north of Ergel's Bar sometime after the Battle of Endor. When the traveler Corwin Ballast asked the bartender Ergel about what jobs were available on Jakku, he mentioned the Wheel Races as one potential source of work.
The Wheel Races were first mentioned in the novel Aftermath, which was written by Chuck Wendig and released in 2015.
